reviews.review: (G)old
I think game is dead but there is a lot of maps with good bots.

A very old world war related valve-ish looking game.
It's a game that was very big and hyped back in the days once it came out.
Now it's a few servers with around 50 max people in total of people playing the game.
Mechanics are meh, graphics/quality is pretty bad but i mean, it's an old game so i don't bother.
Sound, volume and music are meh. The players themselves are camping hardcore, hardcore players with hundreds of hours, screaming and toxic kids and sometimes you encounter glitchers. I mean, it's a good game but do i recommend playing it now? No, not really. It's cheap so try it yourself or ask a refund if not to your liking but right now i give the whole game a 5/10. Back in the days it would've been around a 8.

Classic.
Multiplayer World War II - CS Style
very poor game

I've been playing this game for almost 20 years, since it was a MOD. I still go back to it for the teamwork aspect. Nothing else has come close for me except the old Unreal Tournament - Domination mode. I am not a great shooter but can still really help the team win by paying attention to the captured areas on the map. The shooting is very realistic and balanced and the graphic aren't half bad considering how old it is. Gameplay is smooth on most any system and there are still people playing every day.

An absolute classic of a game in many senses of the word.
There are no fancy graphics, no loot drops or theme park crap, just a good honest shooter you can pass the night away on with a pretty chill community.
You won't play this game for progress. You might not even play it for glory. You'll play it for fun.
one of the best games of my childhood with a fun community that is somehow still around, cant recommend it enough. its a ton of fun

Действия игры происходит в местах проведения военных операций времён Второй Мировой Войны с 1939-1945 г. борьбой между двумя противостоящими командами Альянс (Соединённых Штатов и\или Британских Воиск) и Немецких Фашистов. В наличии оружие ближнего боя: ножи, лопаты и штыки на винтовках, 
пистолеты: барабанный револьвер Webley MkIV 1899, Кольт-Браунинг 1911, Немецкий Люгер 
винтовки: M1 Garand , k43, Kar98k и M1 Carbine
автоматы: Thomson, MP40, Sturmgewehr 44, Greese Gun, Sten, а так же автоматы с прицелом или ножками для установки в качестве пулемёта с точки ведения огня.
пулемёты, базука и панзершрек , а так же 2 типа гранат и пакеты взрывчаток. 
Задача: захватить стратегическую точку (захват флага) и как второстепенно уничтожить противника. Игра происходит в режиме DeathMatch, то есть после смерти, вы появляетесь на базе и продолжаете бой. Раунд заканчивается на победе одной из команд или по истечению времени. 
Игра сделана на лучшем движке для командного шутера - GoldSource, использовавшийся в Half Life 1, в её самой известной модификации COUNTER-STRIKE, играх Quake и Unreal Tournament, Отличительные особенности по отношению к некоторым шутерам является наличие запаса выносливости при ускорении во время бега, возможность лечь на землю или присесть, передавать радио команды, а так же жесты руками. В интерфейсе игры присутствует текстовый и голосовой чат, с возможность выбора вещания: только товарищам по команде или всем в игре.

very good

It's a shooter unique for a few reasons.
1) The community has been playing for 20 years.  Servers are full of very polite older gamers who have warm conversations.  If you play late (3-4 am) you'll play against finely tuned bots.
2) The maps are complicated, destructible and morph as you play.
3) Camoflauge and use of terrain is very important.
4) Team HUD map.
5) Movement/Accuracy tradeoff.
6) Sound of players, and how you control the sound you let off is very important.

I've never had firefights as difficult or prolonged, or such a high skill ceiling in any other game.

Esse jogo marcou muito a minha infância, infelizmente os servidores deles são vazios atualmente, mas ainda existem pessoas jogando, normalmente 2 salas sempre estão cheias(a noite principalmente), a versão com a engine Source é mais movimentada e possui gráficos melhores. Gostaria muito que a Valve fizesse um remaster desse jogo, ou lançasse uma nova versão, creio que faria sucesso, pois é um jogo divertido, modo competitivo dinâmico, eSports nesse game iria ser GG!

first of all, i had this on another account many years ago when CS1.6 was in its glory days. after i got bored of CS i thought hey im gona try this game out. i put hundreds if not thousands of hours into this game it was SO MUCH FUN! the custom maps, the strats used, the guns and weapon recoil my god the MG42 if you wernt prone you had to drag your mouse down 30cm to even land a hit and that was super fun running into buildings and spraying ppl with it!! id really love to see this game get a HD REBOOT (and not the source version of it cus that game was kinda sucky)

Günümüzde hala oynan savaş oyunu. Cephelerle karşı tarafın üzerine gidip bayrak dikmeye çalışıyoruz. Bölgeler el değiştirebiliyor. Çeşitli silahlar var. Zamanına göre güzel bir oyun. Bugün için eskimiş duruma ama klasikler arasında yerini almış bir yapımdır. Serverlarda hala oynayanlar olduğunu görmek ilginç. Günümüzde tavsiye edebileceğim bir oyun değil. Zamanında güzeldi.

Oyunda çok sayıda hata var. Gerçeklikten uzak çok yanı var. Elbette hiç güncelleme almadığı için bu normal ama ufak eklemeler yapılarak bu oyunlar canlandırılabilir aslında :) Valve bu konuda çok büyük hata yapıyor.
Не плохой шутер от Valve

소스나오기 전 앵은 05년 06년 07년도까지 나름 커뮤니티도있고 인지도있는 게임이었는데 iRC서버관리겸 클랜인 P.z.F클랜원이었고 나를 인기도있었던, 클랜정모도하고 애착있었던 게임인데 슬슬 유저들이 사회생활을 하면서, 군대가면서 그렇게 사라진게임..... 많이 애착에 예전 밸브팩으로 사면서 해봤는데 그때나 지금이나 시끄럽기만 한 짱꼴라뿐.... 한국유저는 기껏 한둘.... 비운의 게임이라 너무 가슴아프네 ㅋㅋㅋ
